labels.label: Write events/messages posted in Kafka to COD
Write and Read data from Kafka

In COD created table messagesdemo
create 'messagesdemo', 'metadata'
Follow this doc on setup which is super simple https://docs.cloudera.com/cdf-datahub/7.2.10/nifi-hbase-ingest/topics/cdf-datahub-hbase-table.html
To read messages in COD scan messagesdemo

In COD created table messagesdemo
create 'messagesdemo', 'metadata'
Follow this doc on setup which is super simple https://docs.cloudera.com/cdf-datahub/7.2.10/nifi-hbase-ingest/topics/cdf-datahub-hbase-table.html
To read messages in COD scan messagesdemo
